name: Green Beans
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - vegetables and beans categories
Rich in vitamins K, C, and folate
benefits: Green beans contain approximately 90% water, making them one of the most water-rich vegetables for weight loss. Lightly steamed green beans retain their crisp texture, providing orosensory stimulation that may slow eating rate. As an aboveground vegetable high on the water scale, green beans are ideal for optimizing weight loss meals.
amount: 1½ cups/165g green beans, cut into 1½-inch/4cm pieces and lightly steamed

quotes: 1½ cups/165g green beans, cut into 1½-inch/4cm pieces and lightly steamed
8 ounces/225g green beans, trimmed and cut into 1½-inch/4cm pieces
Add the green beans and carrots and steam until just tender, about 3 minutes.
